document_data.name: ''Braincap''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Braincaps''''' were [[enchanted]] anti-[[illithid]] devices developed by the [[dwarves]] of [[Torglor]] to be used in their struggles against the [[mind flayer]]s of [[Oryndoll]] in the [[Underdark]].
document_data.Powers: ''Braincaps'' provided the wearers with resistance to various [[spell]]s of the [[enchantment]] school of magic and gave them immunity to ''[[mind blast]]s''. These items could be made by skilled crafters of wondrous items with the use of the ''[[spell immunity]]'' incantation.
